bill.title: Prohibits coverage of elective abortions by health insurance issuers
bill.description: Prohibits coverage of elective abortions by health insurance issuers

history.action: Read by title, referred to the Committee on Insurance.
Read by title, amended, ordered engrossed, passed to 3rd reading - regular calendar.
Scheduled for floor debate on April 22, 2010.
Read third time by title, amended, roll called on final passage, yeas 76, nays 13. Finally passed, title adopted, ordered to the Senate.
Received in the Senate. Rules suspended. Read first and second time by title and referred to the Committee on Health and Welfare.
Committee amendments read and adopted. Read by title and referred to the Legislative Bureau.
Reported without Legislative Bureau amendments. Read by title and passed to third reading and final passage.
Rules suspended. The amended bill was read by title, passed by a vote of 28 yeas and 3 nays, and ordered returned to the House. Motion to reconsider tabled.
Received from the Senate with amendments.
Read by title, roll called, yeas 96, nays 1, Senate amendments concurred in.
Enrolled and signed by the Speaker of the House.
Signed by the President of the Senate.
Sent to the Governor for executive approval.
Signed by the Governor. Becomes Act No. 941.
